blogPost.excerpt: Imagine all the money we could unlock by selling subscriptions that we bought but don't really use anymore. flipp is a platform to post your pre-owned subscriptions for sale. we already have 500+ users interested in buying pre-owned subscriptions at unloved.
blogPost.body: Imagine all the money we could unlock by selling subscriptions that we bought but don't really use anymore. flipp is a platform to post your pre-owned subscriptions for sale. we already have 500+ users interested in buying pre-owned subscriptions at unloved.
blogPost.title: flipp - Sell subscriptions you no longer need
blogPost.author: Nitish Rathee

localize.description: 想象一下，我们可以通过出售我们购买但不再真正使用的订阅来解锁所有的钱。Flipp是一个发布二手订阅以供出售的平台。我们已经有500多名用户有兴趣在unLove购买二手订阅。
localize.tagline: 销售您不再需要的订阅

localize.description: 想象一下，我們可以通過出售我們購買但不再真正使用的訂閱來解鎖所有的錢。Flipp是一個發佈二手訂閱以供出售的平臺。我們已經有500多名用戶有興趣在unLove購買二手訂閱。
localize.tagline: 銷售您不再需要的訂閱

previous.excerpt: Placement is Everyone's Talent Agent. We help people get jobs through modern technology plus human support. Fly through your job search at Placement.com.
previous.title: Placement - Fly through your job search with magic tools & expert advice

localize.tagline: 飞翔用神奇的工具和专家的建议帮助您找工作

localize.description: 安置是每個人的人才代理。我們通過現代技術和人力支持幫助人們找到工作。通過你在Placement.com上的求職，你可以在飛翔上找到工作。
